name: Toy Chest
description:
We’re having a playdate at Lyle’s house tonight. I brought my toy soldiers, you brought your dinosaurs, and Maxwell brought his cars. Lyle’s got pretty cool brick men. It’s not often that we get to hang out with all of us together. Let’s build a cool city today with all our toys. You can borrow some of my soldiers if I can use some of cars, okay? This is gonna be so much fun!

Toy Chest is a digital card game for four players, over about 20-30 minutes.Manage your toy units with three of your bestest friends to create the funnest toy city before you have to put them all away for dinner time. 

Download the rules below and go to this link to play. You can also download the .pcio file and import it to playingcards.io.
